mapper.update: update ${extractionName} set same_time_range_again = 0 where same_time_range_again is null ;
update tietou_feature_extraction set min_out_in = 1 where id = #{id}
update tietou_feature_extraction set same_time_range_again = 1,same_route_mark = #{sameRouteMark} where id = #{id}

update tietou_feature_extraction set same_car_number = 1 where id in (select id from (select id from tietou t where id in (select id from tietou_feature_extraction where month_time = #{monthTime} and same_car_number = 0) and EXISTS (select 1 from car_dic where t.vlp_id = id and use_flag = 0) )r)

update tietou_feature_extraction set same_car_number = 1 where id in (select id from (select id from tietou t where id in (select id from tietou_feature_extraction where month_time = #{monthTime} and same_car_number = 0) and EXISTS (select 1 from car_dic where t.envlp_id = id and use_flag = 0) )r)
mapper.select: select distinct car_num_id from ${extractionName} where same_time_range_again = 1
select tf.id,t.entime,t.extime from ${originName} t inner join ${extractionName} tf on t.id = tf.id where t.vlp_id = #{vlpId} and tf.same_time_range_again = 1
select id from tietou_feature_extraction where id between #{begin} and #{end} and different_zhou = 1
mapper.update:
update tietou_feature_extraction set different_zhou = 0 where id IN
#{id}
update tietou_feature_extraction set same_car_number = #{flag} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select same_route_mark from tietou_feature_extraction where vlp_id = #{carId} and same_route_mark is not null
